import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/checkoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

 ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
